text: The Band Perry is an American musical group. The members are Kimberly, Reed and Neil Perry (the first was born in 1981, the second in 1988 and the latter was born in 1990). Their self titled first record was released on October 12, 2010. == Discography == ===Studio albums=== *The Band Perry (2010) *Pioneer (2013) ===Extended plays=== *The Band Perry EP (2010) ==Other websites== *Official website Category:Musical groups established in 2005 Category:Country bands Category:Musical groups from Alabama Category:Musical groups from Mississippi Category:Musical groups from Tennessee Category:2005 establishments in the United States Category:Tri-Cities, Tennessee
title: The Band Perry
